mapper.sql: ID, PINDEX, LID, NAME, PRICE, CYCLE, TYPE, IMG1, IMG2, IMG3, PHONE, ADD1, ADD2, TIME_TYPE, SALE, EPRICE, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLG, VERSION, OPERATOR, OPT_TIME, OPT_EVENT, DCRP
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_broadband_log
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_broadband_log (ID, PINDEX, LID, NAME, PRICE, CYCLE, TYPE, IMG1, IMG2, IMG3, PHONE, ADD1, ADD2, TIME_TYPE, SALE, EPRICE, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLG, VERSION, OPERATOR, OPT_TIME, OPT_EVENT, DCRP ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cycle,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{add1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{add2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optEvent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dcrp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: SELECT a.STATUS, a.CREATE_TIME FROM sys_broadband_log a WHERE a.DELETE_FLG = 0 and a.lid = #{id} order by a.status desc
